segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster; the overflowing water is gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring everywhere, soaking the cabinets— what a filthy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in that puddle, and she just keeps drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids rummaging in the cookie jar on a dirty stool—ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery and wet; it's unhygienic for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron will be soaked soon, covered in who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks grimy, and the boy's hands are probably sticky already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the calm garden view can't mask this indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stealing cookies like that feels sneaky and wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will lead to mold; it's revolting to think about.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to eat anything from this chaotic place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene turns my stomach with its neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
